doc:
Kevin McCarthy (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_McCarthy_(actor) 0 Kevin McCarthy (February 15, 1914 – September 11, 2010) was an American actor who gave over 200 television and film performances. He is best remembered for portraying the male lead in the horror science fiction film Invasion of the Body Snatchers (1956).Following several television guest roles, McCarthy gave his first credited film performance in Death of a Salesman (1951), portraying Biff Loman to Fredric March's Willy Loman. The role earned him a Golden Globe Award and a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor. Kevin_McCarthy ( February_15_,_1914 – September_11_,_2010 ) was an_American_actor who gave over_200_television_and_film_performances . He is_best_remembered for portraying the_male_lead in the_horror_science_fiction_film_Invasion of the_Body_Snatchers ( 1956_) . Following several_television_guest_roles , McCarthy gave his_first_credited_film_performance in Death of a_Salesman_(_1951_) , portraying Biff_Loman to Fredric_March 's_Willy_Loman . The_role earned him a_Golden_Globe_Award and a_nomination for the_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor .
